question: You have recently landed in a foreign country on a work visa and need information about the place in and around the city. Write a letter to the relocation assistance provider seeking help and in your letter,Write why you are writing the letterWhat kind of information you wantHow and by when you can get the requested information
text: I am Tahsin Adam, recently I moved to Canada for work, and I still do not know some important places and laws in this country. Furthermore, I am writing this letter regarding assistance and providing me some facts about Montreal city.

In the beginning, help me to find  suitable accommodation close to my work, and I want you to give me a hand with appropriate details. For instance, license and regulation of driving, health insurance, facilities  provided by their government, and places of interest where I could spend my quality time.

Finally and after your permission, send me all facts to my personal contact or via email, which I mentioned in this letter. Kindly, guide me with queries as soon as possible, so that, I can able to live and adapt to this city quickly.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a preposition with the verb providing. Consider adding the preposition.
